user_question: What are the latest advancements in personalized medicine for cancer treatment, and generate an infographic summarizing these advancements?
final_answer: Recent advancements in personalized medicine for cancer treatment include CRISPR gene editing, CAR-T cell therapy, and AI-driven drug discovery. Infographic summarizing these advancements generated. AI is used to analyze large datasets to identify potential drug candidates, predict drug interactions, and optimize drug design.
